synopsis.text: Kousuke and Asuka, along with their longtime friends Reiji and Kanade, embark on a double date to a traditional Japanese hot spring, aiming to rekindle their friendships and reignite the sparks in their marriages. As the night unfolds, the couples engage in intimate conversations, revealing the discrepancies and unspoken desires in their relationships. In a daring attempt to spice up their lives, they decide to swap partners for a night, unaware of the consequences that await them. As they succumb to the allure of forbidden love, they find themselves entangled in a web of passion and deceit, questioning the very foundations of their marriages. Will they be able to return to their once-innocent lives, or have they forever altered the course of their relationships?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
